about_the_game:
Introducing Dark: The Ultimate Dungeon Crawl Royale!

Dive into a thrilling and immersive 3D multiplayer experience that will push your strategic prowess and survival instincts to the limit. Dark combines the most exhilarating elements of dungeon crawlers and battle royale games, creating a heart-pounding adventure you won't soon forget.

In the twisted and treacherous world of Dark, you'll find yourself pitted against fierce competitors in sprawling, ever-changing dungeons. With procedurally generated environments, you'll never face the same challenge twice. Team up with friends or forge ahead solo, battling monstrous creatures and rival players in a quest for loot, glory, and the ultimate prize: survival.

Key Features

  • Intense PvP and PvE Combat: Engage in fast-paced, strategic battles against both monstrous foes and cunning human adversaries. Use the environment to your advantage as you outwit, outplay, and outlast your rivals.

  • Expansive Character Customization: Choose from a diverse range of equipment and skills to create your ultimate warrior. Experiment with unique abilities and powerful artifacts, tailoring your playstyle to suit your strengths and preferences.

  • Dynamic Dungeon Environments: Delve into a vast array of procedurally generated dungeons, each one more treacherous than the last. With random events and unpredictable layouts, no two encounters will be the same.

  • Competitive Leaderboards and Seasons: Prove your mettle against the best of the best, with leaderboards tracking your progress and seasonal content keeping the challenges fresh and engaging.

  • Robust Social Features: Join forces with friends in co-op play, or test your mettle against rivals in competitive matches. Form or join guilds to share resources and strategies.

name: Dark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dark is an upcoming first-person hardcore multiplayer medieval fantasy extraction game. Customize your hero, explore treacherous dungeons, and engage in strategic battles!
